OptionValue.value:
VMware vCenter Server Appliance 6.5.0.14000
Type: vCenter Server with an embedded Platform Services Controller

OptionDef.label: User validation interval
OptionDef.summary: Interval in minutes between each validation of user and group names. Set to zero to disable validation

OptionDef.label: Enable user validation
OptionDef.summary: Enable validation of users and groups

OptionDef.label: Maximum users to retrieve
OptionDef.summary: Maximum number of users and groups to display in the Add Permissions dialog

OptionDef.label: Enable user retrieve limits
OptionDef.summary: Enable Active Directory query limits

OptionDef.label: User retrieve timeout
OptionDef.summary: Number of seconds to wait for a search for users and groups to return results

OptionDef.label: vCenter Agent Upgrade
OptionDef.summary: Specify if vCenter Agent will be automatically upgraded on each host after a vCenter Server upgrade

OptionDef.label: Host upgrade check frequency
OptionDef.summary: Frequency (in seconds) of monitoring a host upgrade

OptionDef.label: Default alarm upgrade version
OptionDef.summary: Default alarm upgrade version

OptionDef.label: Long operation client timeout
OptionDef.summary: Number of seconds to wait for a response from the vCenter Server for long operations

OptionDef.label: Client timeout
OptionDef.summary: Number of seconds to wait for a response from the vCenter Server for short operations

OptionDef.label: Verify SSL certificates
OptionDef.summary: Requires that remote servers present valid X.509 certificates when making SSL connections

OptionDef.label: Debug Managed Object Browser enabled
OptionDef.summary: Read-only flag indicating whether the Debug Managed Object Browser is enabled on the vCenter Server.

OptionDef.label: DB procedures log buffer
OptionDef.summary: The maximum number of rows to appear in the DB procedures log table(VPX_PROC_LOG)

OptionDef.label: Log level for daily stats purge
OptionDef.summary: What to log during daily stats purge: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for weekly stats purge
OptionDef.summary: What to log during weekly stats purge: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for monthly and yearly stats purge
OptionDef.summary: What to log during monthly and yearly stats purge: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for daily stats rollup
OptionDef.summary: What to log during daily stats rollup: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for weekly stats rollup
OptionDef.summary: What to log during weekly stats rollup: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for monthly stats rollup
OptionDef.summary: What to log during monthly stats rollup: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for topn rank of daily stats
OptionDef.summary: What to log during topn rank of daily stats: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for topn rank of weekly stats
OptionDef.summary: What to log during topn rank of weekly stats: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for topn rank of monthly stats
OptionDef.summary: What to log during topn rank of monthly stats: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for topn rank of yearly stats
OptionDef.summary: What to log during topn rank of yearly stats: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for purge of daily topns
OptionDef.summary: What to log during purge of daily topns: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for purge of weekly topns
OptionDef.summary: What to log during purge of weekly topns: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for purge of monthly topns
OptionDef.summary: What to log during purge of monthly topns: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: Log level for purge of yearly topns
OptionDef.summary: What to log during purge of yearly topns: OFF(nothing), ERR(errors only - default), INF(errors and execution info), CHK(errors,execution and correctness verification)

OptionDef.label: /etc/issue
OptionDef.summary: Contents of /etc/issue

OptionDef.label: /etc/motd
OptionDef.summary: Contents of /etc/motd

OptionDef.label: Batch size in cleanup events procedure
OptionDef.summary: Number of rows purged per loop by the event cleanup procedure

OptionDef.label: Maximum event age
OptionDef.summary: Maximum age in days an event remains in the database

OptionDef.label: Enable event cleanup
OptionDef.summary: Remove events older than the maximum event age

OptionDef.label: Instance ID
OptionDef.summary: Unique instance identifier for vCenter

OptionDef.label: Match host license server to vCenter
OptionDef.summary: When adding a host, make the host's license server settings match vCenter settings

OptionDef.label: Logging level
OptionDef.summary: Amount of detail collected in the log files

OptionDef.label: Mail sender
OptionDef.summary: Email address for email alerts (for example, alarm@company.com)

OptionDef.label: SMTP server password
OptionDef.summary: SMTP server password

OptionDef.label: SMTP server port
OptionDef.summary: SMTP server port number. Typically, this port number is 25

OptionDef.label: SMTP server
OptionDef.summary: SMTP server IP address or DNS name (for example, smtp.company.com)

OptionDef.label: SMTP server username
OptionDef.summary: SMTP server username

OptionDef.label: The update level of vCenter Server
OptionDef.summary: The update level of vCenter Server

OptionDef.label: Maximum statistics collection threads
OptionDef.summary: Maximum number of threads dedicated to performance statistics collection

OptionDef.label: Major database version
OptionDef.summary: Major database schema version

OptionDef.label: Minor database version
OptionDef.summary: Minor database schema version

OptionDef.label: First SNMP receiver community
OptionDef.summary: Community string for SNMP trap (for example, public)

OptionDef.label: Enable first SNMP receiver
OptionDef.summary: Whether SNMP traps are sent to this SNMP receiver

OptionDef.label: First SNMP receiver name
OptionDef.summary: SNMP receiver IP address or DNS name

OptionDef.label: First SNMP receiver port
OptionDef.summary: SNMP receiver port number. If the port number is not set, the Windows default is used, which is typically port 162

OptionDef.label: Second SNMP receiver community
OptionDef.summary: Community string for SNMP trap (for example, public)

OptionDef.label: Enable second SNMP receiver
OptionDef.summary: Whether SNMP traps are sent to this SNMP receiver

OptionDef.label: Second SNMP receiver name
OptionDef.summary: SNMP receiver IP address or DNS name

OptionDef.label: Second SNMP receiver port
OptionDef.summary: SNMP receiver port number. If the port number is not set, the Windows default is used, which is typically port 162

OptionDef.label: Third SNMP receiver community
OptionDef.summary: Community string for SNMP trap (for example, public)

OptionDef.label: Enable third SNMP receiver
OptionDef.summary: Whether SNMP traps are sent to this SNMP receiver

OptionDef.label: Third SNMP receiver name
OptionDef.summary: SNMP receiver IP address or DNS name

OptionDef.label: Third SNMP receiver port
OptionDef.summary: SNMP receiver port number. If the port number is not set, the Windows default is used, which is typically port 162

OptionDef.label: Fourth SNMP receiver community
OptionDef.summary: Community string for SNMP trap (for example, public)

OptionDef.label: Enable fourth SNMP receiver
OptionDef.summary: Whether SNMP traps are sent to this SNMP receiver

OptionDef.label: Fourth SNMP receiver name
OptionDef.summary: SNMP receiver IP address or DNS name

OptionDef.label: Fourth SNMP receiver port
OptionDef.summary: SNMP receiver port number. If the port number is not set, the Windows default is used, which is typically port 162

OptionDef.label: SSL version
OptionDef.summary: SSL cipher required for vCenter client connections

choiceInfo.label: All
choiceInfo.summary: All ciphers allowed; client HELLOs will be sent in SSL version 2

OptionDef.label: Batch size in cleanup tasks procedure
OptionDef.summary: Number of rows purged per loop by the task cleanup procedure

OptionDef.label: Maximum task age
OptionDef.summary: Maximum age in days a task remains in the database

OptionDef.label: Enable event cleanup
OptionDef.summary: Remove tasks older than the maximum task age

OptionDef.label: TopN calculations max log rows
OptionDef.summary: The maximum number of rows to appear in the TopN log table (VPX_TOPN_ERROR_LOG) when TOPN_LOGGING_MODE is ON

OptionDef.label: TopN calculations log level
OptionDef.summary: What to log during TopN calculations: OFF (nothing), INFO (all messages), WARN (warnings and error messages), ERR (error messages)

OptionDef.label: TopN calculations daily delay
OptionDef.summary: Backward offset (in minutes) for calculating the TopN report for data with daily granularity

OptionDef.label: TopN calculations weekly delay
OptionDef.summary: Backward offset (in minutes) for calculating the TopN report for data with weekly granularity

OptionDef.label: TopN calculations monthly delay
OptionDef.summary: Backward offset (in minutes) for calculating the TopN report for data with monthly granularity

OptionDef.label: TopN calculations yearly delay
OptionDef.summary: Backward offset (in minutes) for calculating the TopN report for data with yearly granularity

OptionDef.label: Automatically discovered vCenter management IPv4 address
OptionDef.summary: The automatically discovered IPv4 address of the vCenter Server to which managed hosts send heartbeats

OptionDef.label: Automatically discovered vCenter management IPv6 address
OptionDef.summary: The automatically discovered IPv6 address of the vCenter Server to which managed hosts send heartbeats

OptionDef.label: Cache size
OptionDef.summary: Size of vCenter Server data cache (bytes)

OptionDef.label: Configuration of the Customer Experience Improvement Program
OptionDef.summary: Contains configuration of the Customer Experience Improvement Program. For more information on what data is collected and how it is used, please see http://www.vmware.com/info?id=1311

OptionDef.label: Deprecated. See: VirtualCenter.DataCollector.ConsentData
OptionDef.summary: Deprecated. See: VirtualCenter.DataCollector.ConsentData

OptionDef.label: Customer experience improvement program data collection schedule
OptionDef.summary: Configure when customer experience improvement program data is collected. The value must be in the format 'day-of-week hour minute' in UTC. For example, '2 13 30' for every Tuesday 1:30pm UTC. Sunday is day 0.

OptionDef.label: Database password
OptionDef.summary: The database password

OptionDef.label: vCenter FQDN
OptionDef.summary: The fully qualified domain name of the vCenter Server

OptionDef.label: VirtualCenter Host Bios Uuid
OptionDef.summary: Bios Uuid of the Host or VM this VirtualCenter is running in.

OptionDef.label: Instance name
OptionDef.summary: Name of this vCenter instance

OptionDef.label: vCenter management IP address
OptionDef.summary: IP address of the vCenter Server to which managed hosts will send heartbeats

OptionDef.label: Maximum database connections
OptionDef.summary: Maximum number of database connections

OptionDef.label: VIM API URL
OptionDef.summary: The URL used for VIM API or vSphere Client access to this vCenter instance

OptionDef.label: Password expiration
OptionDef.summary: VIM password expiration (days)

OptionDef.label: Certificate Management Threshold (in days)
OptionDef.summary: When this threshold is reached, the vCenter Server system displays red alarms about the impending certificate expiration.

OptionDef.label: Country Name for the ESXi Host Certificates
OptionDef.summary: The Country Name to be included as part of the ESXi host's certificate

OptionDef.label: Email address for the ESXi Host Certificates
OptionDef.summary: The e-mail address to be included as part of the ESXi host's certificate

OptionDef.label: Locality Name for ESXi Host Certificates
OptionDef.summary: The Locality Name, e.g. city name, to be included as part of the ESXi host's certificate

OptionDef.label: Organizational Unit Name for ESXi Host Certificates
OptionDef.summary: The Organizational Unit Name to be included as part of the ESXi host's certificate

OptionDef.label: Organization Name for ESXi Host Certificates
OptionDef.summary: The Organization Name to be included as part of the ESXi host's certificate

OptionDef.label: State Name for ESXi Host Certificates
OptionDef.summary: The State Name or Province Name to be included as part of the ESXi host's certificate

OptionDef.label: ESXi Certificate Validity Period (in days)
OptionDef.summary: The ESXi host's certificate validity period in days.

OptionDef.label: ESXi Certificate Management Hard Threshold (in days)
OptionDef.summary: The ESXi host's certificate management hard threshold, in days. When this threshold is reached, the vCenter Server system displays red alarms about the impending certificate expiration.

OptionDef.label: ESXi Certificate Validity Check Interval (in days)
OptionDef.summary: The interval (in days) between ESXi host certificate validity checks by the vCenter Server system

OptionDef.label: ESXi Certificate Management Soft Threshold (in days)
OptionDef.summary: The ESXi host's certificate management soft threshold, in days. When this threshold is reached, the vCenter Server system displays information about the impending certificate expiration.

OptionDef.label: ESXi Certificate Management Mode
OptionDef.summary: The ESXi host's certificate management mode. Possible values are vmca, custom, thumbprint.

OptionDef.label: Internal events setting
OptionDef.summary: Internal events setting

OptionDef.label: Enable syslog streaming
OptionDef.summary: Enable streaming of events to syslog

OptionDef.label: Http Client Pool Idle Timeout
OptionDef.summary: Http client pool idle connection timeout value in seconds, set to -1 to disable the timeout

OptionDef.label: License data
OptionDef.summary: Read-only license data

OptionDef.label: Force Download DLF
OptionDef.summary: Download DLFs even if files with same name already exist

OptionDef.label: Server locale
OptionDef.summary: Locale to use for server-generated object names

OptionDef.label: Global message
OptionDef.summary: The global message shown to clients during login

OptionDef.label: Generation port WWN number
OptionDef.summary: Generating of WWN port number for the virtual machine

OptionDef.label: Generation single node WWN
OptionDef.summary: Generating WWN for the virtual machine

OptionDef.label: Usage statistics duration
OptionDef.summary: Length of time in seconds to keep usage data

OptionDef.label: Usage statistics level
OptionDef.summary: The maximum usage counter level to record

OptionDef.label: Save usage statistics to the database
OptionDef.summary: Save usage counters to the database

OptionDef.label: The used database space that triggers an error event
OptionDef.summary: The used database space in percent that triggers an error event

OptionDef.label: The used database space that triggers a warning event
OptionDef.summary: The used database space in percent that triggers a warning event

OptionDef.label: Save usage statistics to a file
OptionDef.summary: Save usage statistics to a log file

OptionDef.label: Enable webscript launcher page
OptionDef.summary: Controls the availability of webscript launcher page.

OptionDef.label: HTTP port number
OptionDef.summary: Port on which to listen for HTTP connections

OptionDef.label: HTTPS port number
OptionDef.summary: Port on which to listen for HTTPS connections

OptionDef.label: WWN instance
OptionDef.summary: Initialize WWN instance number
